title: Cloud over the coral reef
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Coral reefs and islands

description: This film considers the effect of sewage pollution and sedimentation on the coral reefs of the tropics and also examines a severe ecological disturbance of unknown origin - the population explosion of the coral eating Crown of Thorns starfish, which may be caused by pollution or some other form of man's activity.
